Nevermind my previous post.  This one isn't a FAQ (yet). :->

My guess is that JDK 1.4 isn't supported on RedHat 7.x.  Maybe basic
(non-GUI) stuff will work, but apparently some native libraries needed by
AWT and Swing aren't up the versions expected by JDK 1.4.  Can you run *any*
Swing or AWT programs?  I doubt this is a JUnit issue.

Scott Stirling

> -----Original Message-----
> From: chaz <cchoy@...> [mailto:cchoy@...]
>
> Hi,
>   I'm experencing the following error below, when I try to use the
> swing or awt ui of TestRunner. Could someone please help to correct
> this error. I'm using Redhat 7.3 and JUnit 3.8.1, and was just running
> the AllTests sample that came with JUnit.
